rules_text:
Equipped permanent isn’t a creature and is a planeswalker in addition to its other types.
Equipped permanent has “[+2]: Surveil 2.” and “[-6]: Mill three cards. Put any number of permanent cards from among the milled cards onto the battlefield.”
{2}: Put a loyalty counter on target creature or planeswalker you control, and attach Planeswalking Augmentation to it. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
notes:
New card

**I’m not 100% sure if this works in the rules, but if Luxior can exist, so can this.
